name: Cosmic
headline: Cosmic is a headless CMS and API toolkit
description:
Cosmic is a headless CMS and API toolkit to help teams build modern apps faster, together. We provide a web dashboard to create content and API tools to deliver content into any website or app.

Teams benefit from using Cosmic because it eliminates the need to build and maintain their own CMS infrastructure. Teams pay a monthly subscription fee for our hosted CMS and can focus on their application logic, creating great content, and enhancing user experiences.

founders.name: Tony Spiro, Founder
founders.description: My name is Tony Spiro (Cosmic W2019) I'm interested in solving problems with technology. Find me on Twitter: @tonyspiro

generated_description:
**Cosmic: The Smart Headless CMS Toolkit**

Founded in 2016 and hailing from the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco, Cosmic is a headless Content Management System (CMS) designed to transform the way teams create and deliver content. They emerged from Y Combinator’s Batch W19, further solidifying their position in the developer tools arena.

So, what exactly does Cosmic do? At its core, Cosmic equips developers with a powerful API toolkit and a user-friendly web dashboard to craft modern applications swiftly. This allows teams to focus on what truly matters—building great products and enhancing user experiences—without worrying about the hassle of building and maintaining a CMS infrastructure.

***What’s the Big Deal?***

The beauty of Cosmic lies in its simplicity. By subscribing to their service, teams can offload the complicated backend and concentrate on their application logic. Cosmic’s features allow users to manage content for various applications—be it websites, mobile apps, eCommerce platforms, or blogs. Here’s a taste of what they offer:

1. **Multi-Channel Delivery**: Teams can efficiently manage and deliver content to diverse audiences across various platforms.
2. **Developer-First Design**: Built with agility in mind, Cosmic integrates seamlessly with popular frameworks. Developer tools like REST API URLs are just a click away.
3. **AI Integration**: Their AI-assisted features allow for real-time content generation and updates, making it easier to keep pace with the rapidly changing digital landscape.

With a keen focus on collaboration, Cosmic also provides granular user roles and permissions, allowing teams to work securely and efficiently. Automatic backups ensure peace of mind, so content is never lost.

***The Cosmic Experience***

Boasting a lean team of five, Cosmic has made a significant impact in the developer community, earning accolades for its intuitive interface and transparent customer support. Prominent clients—such as Clever, Vuetify, and MoveSpring—point to the responsiveness of Cosmic's team, highlighting how rapid developments and customer feedback are prioritized.

From eCommerce solutions to multimedia management, Cosmic is redefining what it means to be a headless CMS. If you're a developer looking to streamline your workflow and deliver top-notch content experiences without the headaches of traditional CMS management, Cosmic is your go-to solution.

For more information, you can visit their website at [CosmicJS](https://www.cosmicjs.com). 

In a nutshell, Cosmic provides the tools you need to unleash creativity and efficiency in content management without the technical burdens of past systems. If you’re keen on building the future, this might just be the toolkit you didn’t know you needed.
